{{cpp/title | hash{{small|&lt;std::type_index&gt;}}}}
{{cpp/types/type_index/navbar}}
{{ddcl | header=typeindex | since=c++11 | 1=
template&lt;&gt; struct hash&lt;std::type_index&gt;;
}}

The template specialization of {{lc|std::hash}} for {{lc|std::type_index}} allows users to obtain hashes of objects of type {{lc|std::type_index}}.

The member {{c|operator()}} effectively returns the same value as {{lc|hash_code()}}.
